Markus Gross

Markus Gross
Ph.D. Student @ TU Munich
Research Associate @ Fraunhofer IVI

I am a research associate at Fraunhofer IVI and a Ph.D. student at the Technical University of Munich (TUM), supervised by Prof. Dr. Daniel Cremers. Prior to that, I obtained the Master of Science with highest distinction in Computer Science from the Munich University of Applied Sciences.

My research interests include computer vision and deep learning, with their applications in mobile robotics, specifically autonomous flying and driving.

markus.gross(at)tum.de Google Scholar GitHub LinkedIn
